originalText.text: Love Harlem Dental Care! The atmosphere is always great and everybody are friendly. Dr. Nazar is simply amazing! Explains well everything, is very gentle and takes care of the patient to the very detail,the best ever. Also, the technician Boris is very helpful, careing and most of all, funny:)

text.text: Love Harlem Dental Care! The atmosphere is always great and everybody are friendly. Dr. Nazar is simply amazing! Explains well everything, is very gentle and takes care of the patient to the very detail,the best ever. Also, the technician Boris is very helpful, careing and most of all, funny:)

originalText.text: I will recommend their teeth whitening procedure. Fast, comfortable and not a painful as some others that I've had. Also staff and Dr. Scheglov answer all your questions and can take care of all your needs/plans. Great appointment availability and flexibility. Definitely will recommend.  :)

text.text: I will recommend their teeth whitening procedure. Fast, comfortable and not a painful as some others that I've had. Also staff and Dr. Scheglov answer all your questions and can take care of all your needs/plans. Great appointment availability and flexibility. Definitely will recommend.  :)

originalText.text: Great appointment availability, comfortable atmosphere and clean office environment. Knowledgeable, friendly and experienced staff. Dr. Scheglov listens attentively to your wishes and attends to every need. Great teeth whitening experience! Definately will recommend!

text.text: Great appointment availability, comfortable atmosphere and clean office environment. Knowledgeable, friendly and experienced staff. Dr. Scheglov listens attentively to your wishes and attends to every need. Great teeth whitening experience! Definately will recommend!

originalText.text: Excellent dentist. If you are afraid of the dentist Dr. Shcheglov is the one to go to. I've always had a great experience and his work is pain free. You can tell he loves what he does.

text.text: Excellent dentist. If you are afraid of the dentist Dr. Shcheglov is the one to go to. I've always had a great experience and his work is pain free. You can tell he loves what he does.

originalText.text: I had the worst experience with Dr. Mikhail Tsich and his receptionist Dolly. A total waste of time and nerves, worthless entire full year of no work of any kind. I needed a crown on my left side to which Mikhail Tsich had submitted to my insurance without explaining on what is actually happening with my right side with my other tooth, that it’s broken and I can’t chew. I spoke to him and asked him to submit a new claim this time actually explaining the narrative, he said he will and it was a lie on his part. A supervisor from my insurance stated that it was submitted same way carelessly. I called to speak with Dr. Tsich and of course Dolly with her careless attitude stated that she’ll have him reach out to me and he never did. Also, I was in his chair many months ago for cleaning and he said he had to go and do an extraction for another patient and then a minute later I hear a MALE patient screaming, he was doing the extraction without proper IV sedation. He should be sued. I told him that I will not have an extraction with him that I’ll need a referral because he said he cannot sedate me he’s not an oral surgeon, when I asked Dr. Tsich if Dr. Nazar Shcheglov can do the extraction under sedation he said he’s also not a DDS, I was surprised because if you google him it claims DDS. This was the worst experience, I am so happy that I found a good DDS now and am ecstatic to put this horrid experience behind!
